summary: Completed comprehensive Beauty Booking module implementation including: (1) Enhanced admin dashboard with 10+ KPI widgets and revenue charts, (2) Created complete admin CRUD views for bookings, packages, gift cards, retail products, loyalty campaigns, and subscriptions, (3) Built admin sidebar navigation with all menu items and permission checks, (4) Created vendor sidebar for Beauty Booking module and integrated into vendor layout, (5) Enhanced vendor dashboard with booking stats, revenue trends, badge status display, and ApexCharts integration. Currently working on completing remaining vendor views (booking detail, calendar, packages, gift cards, retail, loyalty, subscription, finance, badge status). Next steps: Complete vendor views, then move to customer pages, API extensions, and Flutter integration.
current_status: Phase 2 (Admin Web) mostly complete. Phase 3 (Vendor Web) in progress - sidebar and dashboard complete, remaining vendor views need completion. Phase 4 (Customer Web), Phase 5 (API), Phase 6 (Flutter), and Phase 7 (Testing) still pending.
